thread.title: Madhuri Dixit Nene congratulates Subhash Ghai
thread.title_full: Madhuri Dixit Nene congratulates Subhash Ghai - Entertainment

author: IANS
title: Madhuri Dixit Nene congratulates Subhash Ghai
text:
Actress Madhuri Dixit Nene, who has worked with Subhash Ghai in films like "Ram Lakhan" and "Khalnayak", has congratulated Bollywood's 'showman' as his production banner Mukta Arts has clocked 37 years of existence.

Madhuri Dixit Nene and Subhash Ghai 
Madhuri took to Twitter to congratulate the veteran filmmaker, and wrote: "Congrats to Subhash-Ji for 37 years of #MukhtaArts."
Mukta Arts produced its first film "Karz" in 1978 and after that came out with a string of movies like "Hero", "Karma" and "Taal".
